## when testing localy 
change the   pathPrefix: `/group/psychophys`, to pathPrefix: `${__dirname}/`,"
and use gatsby build --prefix-paths


## when putting on the server 
use gatsby build 

## when deplying on wehab.stanford.edu just use gatsby build to buil

/afs/ir/group/psychophys/WWW
you can connect to cardinal.stanford.edu 
before that, do a VPN by connecting cisco anyconnect app. 
Use the cyberduck app to connect to cardinal.stanford.edu or myth.stanford.edu using an SFTP connection
Then went here https://tools.stanford.edu/cgi-bin/vhost-request to change the host location
